item.title: Pressure Stop Fitting Assemblies (Upper Deck Door(s)) – Freighter with Draw-Through Smoke Detection System – Flight Unpressurized

remarks.para: One forward fitting assembly and/or one aft fitting assembly per door may be missing or inoperative in unpressurized configuration.

numlitem.para: With supernumeraries on board, en route altitude must be limited to 10,000 feet MSL.
Equipment cooling may be operated in NORM or STBY.

Flight must remain with 60 minutes of a suitable landing airport. If operation with equipment Cooling in OVRD mode becomes necessary, an unpressurized configuration yields insufficient equipment cooling.
A minimum of two packs is required.
With supernumeraries on board, flight is limited to an en route altitude of 10,000 feet MSL.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "STOP FITTINGS INOP – AIRCRAFT UNPRESSURIZED". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Visually inspect remaining fittings on affected door(s) for defects.
